channel.title: Is it posible
channel.description:
hey guys,
is it posible to create some area's by myself? like grasslands and mountains? or is there a programm i can download to create area's or is there someone here wo can make a program like that??
regards!
faffert

item.title: Is it posible
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

[quote=“sexy slay, post:7, topic:332336”]Okay so i have the solution to your “Adding Grassland” (if you have a 317 base)
Make Sure to BACKUP your Client.JAVA before attempting this…

  1. Open Client.Java
  2. Click “edit” then “find…”
  3. Type “makeGlobalObject”
  4. Click “Find Next”
  5. After one of the Makeglobalobject lines press enter, creating a line spacing
  6. Insert this code:
makeGlobalObject(XCORD, YCORD, 3794, 0, 10); // grass
  • Replace XCORD And YCORD with your X and Y Coordinates
    Also, 3794 is the grass object
    Another grass code is 3795, and Jungle grass is 4812, 4813, and 4814
  • Water is 43, and 6605

Tell me if you have any errors/bugs
Hope i helped
-Sexy Slay[/quote]
This is NOT the way to do it, you can create custom map data, doing it through spawning objects is not only inefficient but would really make anyone in that area suffer performance-wise. I do believe there are actual map editing programs available(I know there are for RSC, not so much on rs2).

Read full topic

item.title: Is it posible
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

Okay so i have the solution to your “Adding Grassland” (if you have a 317 base)
Make Sure to BACKUP your Client.JAVA before attempting this…

  1. Open Client.Java
  2. Click “edit” then “find…”
  3. Type “makeGlobalObject”
  4. Click “Find Next”
  5. After one of the Makeglobalobject lines press enter, creating a line spacing
  6. Insert this code:
makeGlobalObject(XCORD, YCORD, 3794, 0, 10); // grass
  • Replace XCORD And YCORD with your X and Y Coordinates
    Also, 3794 is the grass object
    Another grass code is 3795, and Jungle grass is 4812, 4813, and 4814
  • Water is 43, and 6605

Tell me if you have any errors/bugs
Hope i helped
-Sexy Slay

Read full topic

item.title: Is it posible
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

Yes you can very easily create your own buildings, though its very time consuming since you have to place every object in your client.java file.
Example:

  • Placing walls as the walls of building
  • Adding desks and chairs
  • Adding stairs/ladders
  • Opening up your saved character file and moving player height to 2.
  • Then creating the second story of building
  • Then add to when you click ladder/stairs you tele to second story
  • Etc.

Hope i helped

  • Sexy slay

Read full topic
